It has a defined structure, including a lead section and one or more sections of content. --> |B-Class-3=yes <!-- 4. It is free from major grammatical errors. --> |B-Class-4=yes <!-- 5. == Dead link ==
During several automated bot runs the following external link was found to be unavailable. Please check if the link is in fact down and fix or remove it in that case!
* http://afhra.maxwell.af.mil/rso/rso_index.html ** In [[Hamilton Air Force Base]] on 2011-03-22 19:58:15, 404 Not Found ** In [[Hamilton Air Force Base]] on 2011-04-18 04:46:30, 404 Not Found ** In [[13th Bomb Squadron]] on 2011-05-23 02:58:17, 404 Not Found ** In [[17th Training Wing]] on 2011-05-25 02:00:51, 404 Not Found ** In [[1st Troop Carrier Group]] on 2011-05-25 06:54:14, 404 Not Found ** In [[13th Bomb Squadron]] on 2011-06-01 15:07:57, 404 Not Found ** In [[17th Training Wing]] on 2011-06-01 22:26:07, 404 Not Found ** In [[18th Operations Group]] on 2011-06-02 00:26:19, 404 Not Found ** In [[1st Troop Carrier Group]] on 2011-06-10 04:31:19, 404 Not Found ** In [[4th Fighter Wing]] on 2011-06-19 14:16:37, 404 Not Found
--[[User:JeffGBot|JeffGBot]] ([[User talk:JeffGBot|talk]]) 14:17, 19 June 2011 (UTC)
== Public Domain ==
It is pretty clear that Sections 2.8 through 2.11 (Lineage, Assignments, Components and Bases assigned) is originally sourced to [http://www.afhra.af.mil/factsheets/factsheet.asp?id=9603], which puts that material in the public domain. That material is also footnoted to three works published by the Office of Air Force History, also in the public domain (although those sources will not support all material in this section)
The Separate paragraph of Section 2 (History)
The following sections are originally sourced to [http://www.seymourjohnson.af.mil/AboutUs/FactSheets/4thFighterWingHistory.aspx], which is also material in the public domain.
The first two sentences of the first paragraph of Section 2.5 (Desert Storm)
The first two sentences of the first paragraph of Section 2.6 (Modern era [sic])
The first paragraph of Section 2.7 (Global War on Terrorism)
The information in the infobox is also not subject to copyvio. --[[User:Lineagegeek|Lineagegeek]] ([[User talk:Lineagegeek|talk]]) 19:01, 30 May 2016 (UTC) :Yes, most of the problem text Bwmoll3 inserted was in the various extra history sections (for all these wings). What I intend to do is, should there be no challenges at the copyvio-day page, is to delete the whole article, to remove the dubious areas, then bring back a 'clean' version including much of the sections you hi-light above. Please make sure, for any of Sections 2.5, 2.6, and 2.7, that a proper footnote is inserted linking them to a PD page where similar text can be verified. Unless anyone else deletes these first, I'll wait another two weeks, and then delete 4th FW, and then give you some more time for 63, 66, and 67 Wings. How does that sound? [[User:Buckshot06|Buckshot06]] [[User_talk:Buckshot06|(talk)]] 22:14, 30 May 2016 (UTC) :: Sounds good, but how does one insert footnotes into text when the article is just the copyvio notice? --[[User:Lineagegeek|Lineagegeek]] ([[User talk:Lineagegeek|talk]]) 21:18, 1 June 2016 (UTC) :::Hi {{ping|Lineagegeek}}, designated rewrite page, as per the copyvio-day page, is [[Talk:4th Fighter Wing/Temp]]. Please feel free to use that as a sandbox, drawing the text where it remains accessible via the article history. [[User:Buckshot06|Buckshot06]] [[User_talk:Buckshot06|(talk)]] 00:35, 3 June 2016 (UTC)
